page.title: 13CHURCHES, PINNER, HARROW.
page.content: The minister of{Pinner United Free {Church}has been a minister for 14 years but has been at this church for only 1 year. About 80 adults, 20 children and 8 Sunday School teachers come to the 10.30am service on Sunday and about 40 people come to the evening service. Most of the people are from the Pinner district. The minister said that he likes family services best and that he performed about 6 marriages per year. The church is very busy because on Monday there is Cub Scouts; on Tuesday, a Women's Meeting, Beavers and Brownies; Wednesday, Bible Studies and a Mothers and Toddlers Group; Thursday, Venture Scouts and Rangers; Friday, Guides and a Bereavement Centre for people whose relatives have died; Saturday, a Youth Club. Every day, there is someone on the phone who will listen to problems.
